newsitem.title: USA: Reliance Steel acquires Siskin Steel.
newsitem.headline: Reliance Steel acquires Siskin Steel.

text.p: Reliance Steel & Aluminum Co said Monday it has agreed to acquire 100 percent of privately held Siskin Steel & Supply Co Inc.
Reliance said in a statement it will pay $71 million in cash for the Chattanooga, Tenn.-based metals service center company. The deal is set to close on October 10.
Siskin's revenues for the fiscal year ended June 30, 1996, were about $151 million. Siskin will operate as a wholly owned subsidiary of Reliance.
